Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.simple_rpg.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Goblin

    public abstract class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that every enemy shall inherit from
    Author:
    Alvin Tan

      • attacked

        public abstract int attacked(int dmg)
        abstract method to calculate true damage from raw damage.
        Parameters:
        dmg - amount of damage the enemy is about to take.
        Returns:
        true damage taken

      • attack

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        raw damage

      • giveReward

        public abstract Reward giveReward()
        abstract method to get the reward after a battle
        Returns:
        the reward that this enemy holds if it's dead otherwise, returns empty reward
